title: User viewing activity
description: Viewing activity generated by a user.

feedbacks.description: One or more items of feedback.

authored.description: The date/time the feedback was authored. ISO-8601 format datetime string, to second resolution, with 'Z' time zone designator.

received.description: The date/time the activity was received. ISO-8601 format datetime string, to second resolution, with 'Z' time zone designator.
